metadata.title: Risk approach : an approach for estimating risk to public safety from uncontrolled sour gas releases : ERCB supplemental appendices to volumes 5 and 6

metadata.description: App. A. ERCB statistical data on sweet and sour : well blowouts (drilling, non-drilling and producing operations) and pipeline failures (leaks and ruptures) -- App. B.
